channel.title: Someone check my game website so i can put it in my sig for others to play
channel.description:
^what the title said
its a cool bloody 2d (maybe 3d) action/shooting game.
here it is
[url=http://www.crazymonkeygames.com/Thing-Thing-Arena-2.html]http://www.crazymonkeygames.com/Thing-Thing-Arena-2.html[/url]
mods or admins please check the sait see if its O.K.
EDIT: lock the thread, already asked mopar to check
